articles.author: Rezaul H Laskar
articles.title: Ukraine crisis to figure in PM’s 3-day Europe visit: Foreign secretary - Hindustan Times
articles.description: The three-day visit will end with a stopover in Paris on May 4 for a meeting with French President Emmanuel Macron. This is Modi’s first foreign visit of the year and also the first since the Russian invasion of Ukraine in February. | Latest News India
articles.content: New Delhi: The Ukraine crisis is expected to figure during Prime Minister Narendra Modis three-nation European tour beginning on Monday though the principal focus will be on cooperation in key areas … [+4341 chars]

articles.title: EU leans towards Russian oil ban by year-end, diplomats say - Reuters.com
articles.description: The European Union is leaning toward a ban on imports of Russian oil by the end of the year, two EU diplomats said, after talks between the European Commission and EU member states this weekend.
articles.content: BRUSSELS, May 1 (Reuters) - The European Union is leaning toward a ban on imports of Russian oil by the end of the year, two EU diplomats said, after talks between the European Commission and EU memb… [+2219 chars]

articles.title: Coronavirus: What do we know about new COVID-19 Omicron subvariant BA.4 after detection in New Zealand - Newshub
articles.description: The new variant has been widely found in Southern Africa and Europe while a case was reported in New South Wales on Friday.
articles.content:
So what do we know about this new variant?

articles.title: Space Station Expedition 67 Crew Wraps Up Busy Week After Crew-4 Arrival and Spacewalk - SciTechDaily
articles.description: Two Roscosmos cosmonauts conducted a spacewalk to activate the new European Robotic Arm (ERA) less than a day after the SpaceX Crew-4 mission arrived at the International Space Station (ISS). The next major mission event taking place will occur next week when…
